channel.title: Client won't start... Could not find the main class: EGUI
channel.description:
Ok now that I got the server problem fixed "THANKS COLKILL"... On any client at all I get the same error...
Code: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: Java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at Java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run<Unknown Source> at Java,security.AccessController.do<Unknown Source> at Java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass<Unknown Source> at Java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at Java.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass<Unknown Source> at java.lang.ClassLoader.LoadClass<Unknown Source> Could not find the main class: EGUI. Program will exit.[/code]
I don't get it... Does it have to do with the environment variable?

item.title: Client won't start... Could not find the main class: EGUI
item.dc:creator: @Coldkill Coldkill
item.description:
@Coldkill wrote:

killax:

nope… it’s still the same.

then sorry i have no clue what can be causing it…i suggest a new client maybe?

item.title: Client won't start... Could not find the main class: EGUI
item.dc:creator: @Coldkill Coldkill
item.description:
@Coldkill wrote:

make a new notepad or w.e and put this…

[code]import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;

public class EGUI
{
public static void main(String args[])
{
client.main(new String[] {
“your server ip”, “your server ip”, “your server ip”
});
}
}[/code]

Put your no-ip were it says “your server ip”

save it as “EGUI.java” compile and see if it works

Read full topic

it doesn’t work… it does the same thing.

item.source: Client won't start... Could not find the main class: EGUI

item.title: Client won't start... Could not find the main class: EGUI
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you edit the batch file to run the client, inside is probably something like this:

@ECHO OFF JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

Just change it to

@ECHO OFF JAVA -Xmx500m client

Read full topic
